skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mixed reality neurodiversity
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Neurodiversity Movement is a movement for the acceptance of the mind as a ecosystem, an acceptance of people with Asperger's, ASD ADHD, anxiety and similar syndromes as normal people with an independent culture, a cultural minority needing no cure , treatment or intervention. In this skill the author presents a presentation on applications of mixed reality in open ended game based education and in newer design paradigms, like participatory design and design for diversity.
This skill accompanies a scientific publication by the author.
Bheemaiah, A., Dr. (2020, November 29). Mixed Reality , Applications in Neurodiversity. https://doi.org/10.31234/osf.io/29y87
 "The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis.
